hotels.title: Stylish Seaside Santa Monica Luxury with Five Eateries & Lagoon Pool
hotels.description: Experience Santa Monica’s most storied coastal retreat, home to the region’s only private bungalows and a legacy of celebrity stays including Greta Garbo and Marilyn Monroe. Set atop the bluffs overlooking the golden beaches of Los Angeles, this 19th-century estate is a luxury hideaway placing you moments from the Santa Monica Pier and Third Street Promenade. Unwind by the palm-fringed pool or savor ocean-to-table flavors at FIG Restaurant. Sip handcrafted cocktails with sunset views at The Bungalow, or enjoy an intimate eight-seat sushi experience at Soko Sushi, which also offers meals to go. Stay refreshed with the onsite Em Styles Salon and Lloyd's Barbershop and a 24-hour fitness centre. Spanning five acres of lush gardens, embody laid-back luxury with effortless California cool.

hotels.title: Stylish Santa Monica Stay Steps from Beachfront with Saltwater Pool & Ocean View Restaurant
hotels.description: Make a splash with a sunsine-soaked stay at The Pierside Santa Monica, moments from the beach and overlooking the picturesque pier. Enjoy leisurely and laid-back days in stylish, ocean-inspired spaces, and ensure a refreshing dip in the outdoor saltwater pool. Or loan a surfboard or skateboard from the onsite shop and head out to explore the best of the area's beaches, trails and parks, before treating yourself to a deliciously flavourful SoCal meal at The Surfing Fox as you watch the tide come in.

hotels.title: Luxury Santa Monica Hotel Moments from the Ocean & Iconic Pier
hotels.description: Swap California dreaming for California living with a luxury stay at Viceroy Santa Monica - enviably located mere steps from the golden beachfront and close to the best attractions of bustling Los Angeles. Embraced by gently rustling palm trees, mountains and salty ocean breezes, this stylish property features two shimmering outdoor pools and the laidback Sugar Palm Ocean Avenue, offering an indoor-outdoor dining and nightlife experience with a wraparound bar and poolside cabanas.
